author: jliu
msg: Looks like the JAXB databinding in JAX-RS can be very simple. Different from WSDL-based services in CXF, the JAXB databinding in JAX-RS does not need to handle Array, List etc as a pure plain-old-xml binding does not allow multiple root elements anyway, you always have to use a wrapper class, like Books.
